overview: Max and Mark are two sailor trainees, looking for adventure and poetry. They are sailing from Brittany to Scotland aboard of « Soutien de famille », a ship who is just restored. On arrival, they have a promise to keep : transform the hull of their ship to barrels of scotch whisky. A bet looking like a performance which will have to come to terms with the tantrum of the sea. How far these two friends will go to meet their freedom ?
title: Soutien de famille
